text: Insula Magica is a musical collective from Novosibirsk, Russia. The ensemble recreates early music. ==History== In 1981, a group of students of the Novosibirsk Conservatory founded the musical collective. They were united by the idea of reconstruction of early music. Since 1991, Insula Magica has officially become a collective of the Novosibirsk Philharmonic. Insula Magica has participated in various festivals in Russia, France, Japan, England, Denmark and other countries. In September 2009, the ensemble represented Russian culture in Stockholm at the 'Vox Pacis' International Festival.Novosibirsk ensemble of early music presented Russia at the international festival in Sweden.
